basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2026.

work.summary: Contribute to the Tapis Framework, which provides a hosted, unified web-based API for securely managing computational research workloads across institutions.
highlights: Utilize high-performance computing (HPC) clusters for deep-learning tasks
Identify, communicate, and mitigate potential setbacks in collaboration with campus cyberinfrastructure and network operators

work.summary: Supported, managed, and administered licenses for software and application services at the Information Technology Services Site License department.
highlights: Diagnosed and resolved technical issues on Windows and macOS devices
Assisted in installing and upgrading various system software and related utilities

work.summary: Participated in a student-led, extracurricular organization focused on real-world training for cyber defense.
highlights: Webmaster/IT Officer, IEEE Student Branch, UH Manoa, 2012-2013

awards.title: B+ Scholarship
